about_the_game:
ABOUT DAWN OF SHADOW


Evil lurks the realm! An ancient force is awakening from it's ashes. Dawn of Shadow set in a Low-Fantasy Medieval World.
Choose your path and dive into a tale of epic fantasy in this action RPG title!

CREATE YOUR HERO
Become a keeper of the peace, join order of the Knight Templars. Choose from a wide selection of character customization elements, or play as a pre-built character. Explore, build, loot, battle through the realm and beyond.

AN ORIGINAL STORY
You find yourself in a cataclysmic turn of events. Templar Order, once Realm's mightiest heroes, now turn evil, seek to dominate free peoples and anyone who oppose them. Seeking ancient knowledge, they plan to awaken Legions of Hell back from the Abyss.

FAMILIAR YET UNIQUE
As fans of aRPG, Hack and Slash, and Souls-like games. We tried our best to mix best parts of those genres.

Magic Schools
Learn from different trainers or explore ancient knowledge to unlock hidden Magical abilities

Items, Loot and Enchantments
Hundreds of items and item enchantments that comes with a unique Rune system.

Tactical Combat
Tactical combat that offers wide range of weapons with unique playstyles, skills and combos!

Character Customization
Create your own Hero, and customize even more as game progresses!

Unique Boss Fights
Each boss feels different! Adapt, follow patterns and slay.

Wide range of Enemies and Monsters
Over hundred of different Mob types to battle from Wights to Humans, Orcs to Treants.

Quests & Player Driven Story
Follow the main storyline or create your own story.

A living world
From towns to castles, dungeons to ruins. Dawn of Shadow offers wide variety of places to visit and explore.
